overview_of_class: This is an advanced course in statistical physics which emphasizes: thermodynamic fluctuations; spatial and temporal correlation functions; spectral and susceptibility functions; Brownian motion; critical phenomena; renormalization group theory; and nonequilibrium and dynamic aspects of phase transitions.
name: Statistical Physics
title: WCAS PHYSICS 420-0-20 Statistical Physics
